coded_answer.p: I am really pleased hearingto hear from you, that I won the prize. So I can go camping for two weeks. It must be great.

As regards your questions, I would like to travel in July because at the moment I am a student and my summer holiday will start on 27th June so I can go to the U.S.A in July and I prefer staying in tents because I have never experienced camping in thea tent. So exciting!

And I would like to have chances to play tennis and go swimming. In the case of swimming, I am really good at it but I just started playing tennis beforeago 3 weeks3 weeks ago. However, I am veryreally enjoying playing tennis.

Further, I have a question. Actually I have never gonebeen camping so I really have no idea about that. I wonder which clothes are suitable for your camping. And How about the money? Do you thinkknow if there isare some occasions to spend money or not? I am really expectinglooking forward to going camping
